subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous monument in Rajasthan was built during the Mughal era?

question_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
question_hi.question_en: Which famous monument in Rajasthan was built during the Mughal era?
question_hi.question_hi: राजस्थान में मुगल के समय के लिए बनाया गया एक फ्रेंडिस्ट

options.explanation_en: Amer Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a popular monument in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built during the Mughal era by Sultan Sanga in 1592 AD.
options.explanation_hi: एमर फॉट, यह जापान, राजस्थान में फर्मियों के प्रमाणे के मूल में बनी है। वह 1592 AD में सरकारी सुलों ने बना।

options.explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built by Maharaja Sawai Mansingh I in 1792 AD.
options.explanation_hi: ह्वा माहल, राजस्थान में स्वलों ने बना।

options.explanation_en: Amber Fort is a historic palace located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built by Raja Mansingh I in 1592 AD.
Circus Bazar is a marketplace located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was established by Maharaja Jai Singh I in 1648 AD.
Hawa Mahal is a palace located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh in 1799 AD.
Samode Haveli is a palace located in Samode, Rajasthan. It was constructed during the Mughal era.
